block.p: BASEBALL American League ANAHEIM ANGELS--Signed a two-year working agreement with Rancho Cucamonga of the California League. TEXAS RANGERS--Promoted Tim Hallgren to director of amateur scouting. National League PHILADELPHIA PHILLIES--Announced a four-year working agreement with Lakewood of the South Atlantic League. SAN DIEGO PADRES--Recalled RHP Buddy Carlyle from Las Vegas of the PCL.
Eastern League NEW BRITAIN ROCK CATS--Announced a two-year extension of their player development contract with the Minnesota Twins, through the 2002 season.

BASEBALL American League ANAHEIM ANGELS--Signed a two-year working agreement with Rancho Cucamonga of the California League. TEXAS RANGERS--Promoted Tim Hallgren to director of amateur scouting. National League PHILADELPHIA PHILLIES--Announced a four-year working agreement with Lakewood of the South Atlantic League. SAN DIEGO PADRES--Recalled RHP Buddy Carlyle from Las Vegas of the PCL.
Eastern League NEW BRITAIN ROCK CATS--Announced a two-year extension of their player development contract with the Minnesota Twins, through the 2002 season.
BASKETBALL National Basketball Association MIAMI HEAT--Re-signed C Duane Causwell. Agreed to terms with F Ron Hale. PHOENIX SUNS--Agreed to terms with G Mario Elie.
FOOTBALL National Football League SAN FRANCISCO 49ERS--Waived G Dwayne Ledford.

HOCKEY National Hockey League ANAHEIM MIGHTY DUCKS--Agreed to terms with D Oleg Tverdovsky on a three-year contract. BOSTON BRUINS--Assigned to D Elias Abrahamsson, D Johnathan Aitken, D Vratislav Cech, D Shane Belter, D Keith McCambridge, D Eric Van Acker, D Denis Timofeev, G Seamus Kotyk, F Peter Ferraro, F Joel Trottier, F Jeremy Brown, F Eric Manlow, F Jeff Zehr, F Matt Zultek, F Shawn Mather, F Blaz Emersic, F Mattias Karlin, F Joe Talbot and F Michael Mader to Providence of the AHL. Sent F Sean Pronger on loan to Manitoba of the IHL. Returned G Donald Choukalos to Regina of the WHL and D Tuukka Makela to Montreal of the QMJHL. Released G Ryan Aschaber, F Colton Orr and F Chris Pittman. COLUMBUS BLUE JACKETS--Released LW Robb Palahnuk, LW Ben Keup and RW Jeff Mitchell. WASHINGTON CAPITALS--Signed C Jan Bulis to a three-year contract.
COLLEGE SMU--Named Beverly Bowes women's tennis coach. URI--Named Deanna Tate assistant women's basketball coach.
